name: Barbarous: Family Secrets
description:
After winning the tavern wars Emyr got to know where his lost wife is now. He closed his tavern and went on the road with Lysella, to find Kintara.

As they venture into the depths of the abyss in search of Kintara, an ancient evil emerges from the shadows seeking vengeance upon Emyr and posing a threat to the entire world. Emyr and his companions must find a way to stop this malevolent force and hold onto hope that they will succeed in their quest.

The path ahead is not going to be a smooth one. In their journey, they will encounter multiple obstacles that might lead them to lose track of their emotions. However, if they wish to reach their goal and ensure a brighter future, they need to overcome their weaknesses and emerge victorious. Will their struggle be futile? Can they succeed in defeating the ultimate evil? Play now to find out!

FEATURES:
🍖 Emyr invites you to join him on a new adventure, filled with humorous awkward moments and thrilling action
🍖 Meet your favorite characters again, and get to know the new ones, entangled in a new adventure
🍖 Grab the sword and head into the unknown to secure a better tomorrow for your family and friends
🍖 Visit amazing new and old locations that will astonish you with their beauty and detail
🍖 Finish all 60 levels of the game on one of three difficulty levels
🍖 Find out if the next adventure will have a happy ending for all
